abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Christine Moore pay for monthly MetroCard so that she can attend job interviews.
lead_paragraph: Despite a professional setback that left her broke, hungry and drinking too much, Christine Moore is determined to reclaim the kind of success she once knew.

headline.main: Finding Her Footing Once More After Slipping Off the Career Ladder
headline.print_headline: Finding Her Footing Once More After Slipping Off the Career Ladder
